Settings.Name: CreateRestorePoint
Settings.Description: Create a system restore point

Settings.Name: DisableTelemetry
Settings.Description: Disable telemetry, diagnostic data, activity history, app-launch tracking & targeted ads

Settings.Name: DisableSuggestions
Settings.Description: Disable tips, tricks, suggestions and ads in start, settings, notifications and File Explorer

Settings.Name: DisableEdgeAds
Settings.Description: Disable ads, suggestions and the MSN news feed in Microsoft Edge

Settings.Name: DisableLockscreenTips
Settings.Description: Disable tips & tricks on the lockscreen

Settings.Name: DisableBing
Settings.Description: Disable & remove Bing web search, Bing AI and Cortana from Windows search

Settings.Name: DisableCopilot
Settings.Description: Disable & remove Microsoft Copilot

Settings.Name: DisableRecall
Settings.Description: Disable Windows Recall (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: DisableClickToDo
Settings.Description: Disable Click to Do, AI text & image analysis (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: DisableWidgets
Settings.Description: Disable widgets on the taskbar & lockscreen

Settings.Name: HideChat
Settings.Description: Hide the chat (meet now) icon from the taskbar (Windows 10 only)

Settings.Name: ShowKnownFileExt
Settings.Description: Show file extensions for known file types

Settings.Name: DisableFastStartup
Settings.Description: Disable Fast Start-up

Settings.Name: Hide3dObjects
Settings.Description: Hide the 3D objects folder under 'This pc' in File Explorer (Windows 10 only)

Settings.Name: DisableModernStandbyNetworking
Settings.Description: Disable network connectivity during Modern Standby (If supported)

Settings.Name: DisableDVR
Settings.Description: Disable Xbox game/screen recording

Settings.Name: DisableGameBarIntegration
Settings.Description: Disable Game Bar integration

Settings.Name: ClearStart
Settings.Description: Remove all pinned apps from the start menu for this user only

Settings.Name: ClearStartAllUsers
Settings.Description: Remove all pinned apps from the start menu for all existing and new users

Settings.Name: DisableStartPhoneLink
Settings.Description: Disable the Phone Link mobile devices integration in the start menu

Settings.Name: DisableSettings365Ads
Settings.Description: Disable Microsoft 365 ads in Settings Home (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: DisableEdgeAI
Settings.Description: Disable AI features in Microsoft Edge (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: DisablePaintAI
Settings.Description: Disable AI features in Paint (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: DisableNotepadAI
Settings.Description: Disable AI features in Notepad (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: EnableDarkMode
Settings.Description: Enable dark mode for system and apps

Settings.Name: RevertContextMenu
Settings.Description: Restore the old Windows 10 style context menu (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: DisableMouseAcceleration
Settings.Description: Turn off Enhance Pointer Precision (mouse acceleration)

Settings.Name: DisableStickyKeys
Settings.Description: Disable the Sticky Keys keyboard shortcut (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: DisableDesktopSpotlight
Settings.Description: Disable the Windows Spotlight desktop background option

Settings.Name: TaskbarAlignLeft
Settings.Description: Align taskbar icons to the left (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: CombineTaskbarAlways
Settings.Description: Always combine taskbar buttons and hide labels for the main display (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: CombineMMTaskbarAlways
Settings.Description: Always combine taskbar buttons and hide labels for secondary displays (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: CombineTaskbarWhenFull
Settings.Description: Combine taskbar buttons and hide labels when taskbar is full for the main display (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: CombineMMTaskbarWhenFull
Settings.Description: Combine taskbar buttons and hide labels when taskbar is full for secondary displays (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: CombineTaskbarNever
Settings.Description: Never combine taskbar buttons and show labels for the main display (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: CombineMMTaskbarNever
Settings.Description: Never combine taskbar buttons and show labels for secondary displays (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: MMTaskbarModeAll
Settings.Description: Show app icons on all taskbars (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: MMTaskbarModeMainActive
Settings.Description: Show app icons on main taskbar and on taskbar where the windows is open (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: MMTaskbarModeActive
Settings.Description: Show app icons only on taskbar where the window is open (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: HideSearchTb
Settings.Description: Hide search icon from the taskbar (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: ShowSearchIconTb
Settings.Description: Show search icon on the taskbar (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: ShowSearchLabelTb
Settings.Description: Show search icon with label on the taskbar (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: ShowSearchBoxTb
Settings.Description: Show search box on the taskbar (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: HideTaskview
Settings.Description: Hide the taskview button from the taskbar (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: EnableEndTask
Settings.Description: Enable the 'End Task' option in the taskbar right click menu (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: EnableLastActiveClick
Settings.Description: Enable the 'Last Active Click' behavior in the taskbar app area

Settings.Name: ShowHiddenFolders
Settings.Description: Show hidden files, folders and drives

Settings.Name: ExplorerToHome
Settings.Description: Change the default location that File Explorer opens to 'Home'

Settings.Name: ExplorerToThisPC
Settings.Description: Change the default location that File Explorer opens to 'This PC'

Settings.Name: ExplorerToDownloads
Settings.Description: Change the default location that File Explorer opens to 'Downloads'

Settings.Name: ExplorerToOneDrive
Settings.Description: Change the default location that File Explorer opens to 'OneDrive'

Settings.Name: HideHome
Settings.Description: Hide the Home section from the File Explorer sidepanel (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: HideGallery
Settings.Description: Hide the Gallery section from the File Explorer sidepanel (Windows 11 only)

Settings.Name: HideDupliDrive
Settings.Description: Hide duplicate removable drive entries from the File Explorer sidepanel

Settings.Name: DisableTransparency
Settings.Description: Disable transparency effects

Settings.Name: DisableAnimations
Settings.Description: Disable animations and visual effects

Settings.Name: HideIncludeInLibrary
Settings.Description: Hide the 'Include in library' option in the context menu (Windows 10 only)

Settings.Name: HideGiveAccessTo
Settings.Description: Hide the 'Give access to' option in the context menu (Windows 10 only)

Settings.Name: HideShare
Settings.Description: Hide the 'Share' option in the context menu (Windows 10 only)

Settings.Name: HideOnedrive
Settings.Description: Hide the OneDrive folder in the File Explorer sidepanel (Windows 10 only)

Settings.Name: HideMusic
Settings.Description: Hide the music folder under 'This pc' in File Explorer (Windows 10 only)
